campaignTitle: Revolutionize the Tech Industry with TechSprint
campaignSubtitle: Join Us in Shaping the Future of Technology
description: TechSprint is a dynamic startup with a bold vision to transform the tech industry. We're passionate about innovation and are on a mission to create cutting-edge products that will revolutionize the way we interact with technology.

campaignStory.content: We believe that technology should be accessible and user-friendly. Our journey began with a group of visionary engineers and designers who came together to build products that break the mold. We've spent years refining our ideas, and now we're ready to bring them to life.
campaignStory.whySupportUs: By supporting TechSprint, you're not just helping a startup; you're becoming a part of our tech revolution. Your contributions will directly fund the development of our groundbreaking projects that will shape the future of technology.
campaignStory.progress: We've made significant progress in our research and development phase. With your support, we can accelerate our timeline and bring our products to market faster. Your contributions will go towards product development, testing, and manufacturing.
campaignStory.challenges: Like all startups, we face challenges. But we're committed to overcoming them. With your backing, we can navigate obstacles and stay focused on our mission. Together, we can bring innovative tech solutions to the world.
campaignStory.team: Our team consists of passionate engineers, designers, and tech enthusiasts who are dedicated to making a difference. We have a track record of delivering exceptional products and are excited to take on this new adventure.
campaignStory.useOfFunds: The funds raised will be used for product development, prototyping, manufacturing, and marketing. We'll also invest in research to ensure our products meet the highest standards of quality and user experience.

rewards.title: Early Bird Supporter
rewards.description: Be among the first to receive our groundbreaking tech product at an exclusive early bird price.

rewards.title: TechSprint T-Shirt
rewards.description: Receive a stylish TechSprint branded T-shirt as a token of our appreciation.

rewards.title: VIP Tech Tour
rewards.description: Join us for an exclusive behind-the-scenes tour of our tech lab and meet the TechSprint team in person.

campaignStory.risks: While we are confident in our abilities, there are risks associated with product development and manufacturing. Delays or unforeseen challenges may occur. We promise to keep our backers informed and transparent throughout the journey.

faq.question: When will I receive my reward?
faq.answer: Reward delivery dates may vary depending on the pledge level and the project's development timeline. We will provide regular updates to keep you informed.

faq.question: What happens if the funding goal isn't met?
faq.answer: If we don't reach our funding goal, all backers will be refunded, and the project may be reevaluated for future development.

faq.question: Can I change my pledge?
faq.answer: Yes, you can adjust your pledge amount or choose a different reward at any time before the campaign ends.
